div.style: position: absolute; overflow: hidden; left: 0px; top: 0px; width: 1800px; height: 450px;

div.div: Beginning Monday, April 20th, we have decided to reduce meal distribution to one day per week. Meals will be available on Mondays from 11:00 am-12:00 pm. Click the headline for more information.

Dear Parents/Guardians:
For those students who want to pick up their personal belongings and musical instruments, we will be providing an opportunity for curbside pickup on Friday, March 20, 2020, from 10:00 AM to 4:00 PM at each school. Given the large number of students we wish to accommodate, it would be appreciated if your requests were limited to the most essential items necessary for your student's education and welfare.
While schools are closed, Massena Central School will be providing FREE meals to ALL children 18 and under. Please follow this link to view the locations where the meals will be available.

Effective today, Tuesday, March 17, 2020, from 1:00 - 4:00 PM, and again tomorrow Wednesday, March 18, 2020 from 10:00 AM - 4:00 PM, chromebooks for remote learning will be distributed for all students in the District, Grades K - 12.

Due to the State of Emergency declared by the St. Lawrence County Board of Directors, and in consultation with St. Lawrence County and St. Lawrence Public Health, the St. Lawrence-Lewis BOCES and its 18 school districts have made a unanimous decision to close school immediately until at least April 20th. The districts, in collaboration with Public Health, will reevaluate the return of staff and students prior to the 20th to determine whether or not it is safe to return.
We aspire to be a leading educational community that values diversity and prepares students to meet today’s goals and tomorrow’s opportunities.
